main.aboutusdesc: Ivenkile ngokubanzi liziko levenkile yazo zonke iivenkile eziGcweleyo kwilizwe jikelele ezibandakanya kubasasazi abakhethekileyo beempawu ezaziwayo.
main.subscribedesc: Nceda ufake i-imeyile yakho ukuba ufuna ukufumana iindaba zakutshanje kuthi.

title: Nika kude %s
subtitle: Bhalisa ngoku ukufumana ithuba lokuphumelela i- %s!

section1.sDesc1: Kulapha kuphela apho unokufumana khona izibonelelo ezininzi, kulula ukujoyina, ezona zinto zibalaseleyo zokunika iimveliso kunye nezinye izibonelelo

banner1.bDesc1: Ukuba ubhalisile, jonga i-imeyile yakho rhoqo ukufumana ulwazi olutsha kuthi. Siza kukhupha iivawutsha zokuthenga ezivenkileni simahla. Ingaba ulunde ntoni! Qalisa

section2.sDesc2: Khetha isipho osithandayo, ungathatha inxaxheba kuyo yonke into oyinikwayo kuluhlu esinikezela ngalo ngezantsi.

banner2.bDesc2: Kuphela ngokuzibhalisa ngokwakho apho unokuthatha inxaxheba khona. Ingaba ulunde ntoni! masibe Bhalisa ngokwakho okwangoku.

section3.sDesc3: Fumana iGainAway yasimahla zingaphelanga iiyure ezingama-24! Ungaphoswa leli thuba linqabileyo, kulula kakhulu, vele ubhalise kwiwebhusayithi yethu kwaye uthathe uvavanyo (ukuba ikhona), awunakuhlawula nto. Ndiyakuvuyela!

step1.ssDesc11: Ukufumana ithuba lokuphumelela i- %s, konke ekufuneka ukwenzile kukugcwalisa ifom yobhaliso lweakhawunti yakho. Ukuqalisa, ngenisa nje ukhuphiswano ngedilesi ye-imeyile.

step2.ssDesc21: Nje ukuba ungene ngemvume, uya kuba nethuba lokufumana amangeniso ongezelelweyo ngokugcwalisa izinto ezahlukeneyo, kubandakanya nokutyelela amajelo eendaba ezentlalo.
step2.ssDesc22: Unelungelo lokugqiba amanyathelo amaninzi njengoko uthanda, isenzo ngasinye sinikezela ngenani elilodwa lokungeniswa kunye nokungena ngalunye kukuphumelela.

step3.ssDesc31: Yenziwe. Siza kuqhagamshelana nawe ngoko nangoko ngokusekwe kunxibelelwano olwaluzaliswe ngexesha lobhaliso kwindawo yethu.

banner3.bDesc3: Esi siganeko sibonelela kwiindawo zokuwina ezingaphezulu kunonyaka ophelileyo. Mema abahlobo bakho kunye nosapho ngamathuba amakhulu nangakumbi. Bhalisa ngoku ngaphambi kwesi siganeko.

theWinner.coment1: Enkosi ngeCash, ndiyathemba ukuba ivenkile yakho iya kuba nabantu abaninzi.
theWinner.coment2: Le yivenkile edumileyo yakwaGeneralStore, ipasile ibe yimpumelelo endiyifumeneyo, iMveliso yeyentsusa, kwaye andibhatalanga mali. Enkosi.
theWinner.coment3: Kuqala khange ndikholelwe, kodwa emva kokuba ndinxibelelane nabo kwavela ukuba yayiyiStoreStore Jikelele. enkosi GeneralStore nge %s.
theWinner.coment4: Ndiyabulela uthixo ngokwandisa ithamsanqa lam, enkosi ngokunikwa, GeneralStore ndiyayithanda.

section5.sTitleBefore5: Ukuqhuba kakuhle kwemicimbi yethu kunye neshishini
section5.dSupport1: Inkampani yetekhnoloji yamazwe aphesheya yaseMelika ese Seattle, Washington, egxile kwi-e-yorhwebo, kwikhompyuter yelifu, kusasazo lwedijithali, nakwingqondi eyenziweyo.
section5.dSupport2: Umthengisi weintanethi waseMelika othengisa ikakhulu ifenitshala ekwindawo eseMidvale, eUtah, kufutshane neSalt Lake City. UPatrick M. Byrne waseka i-Overstock.com ngo-1999.
section5.dSupport3: Inkampani yaseMelika yamazwe aphesheya ethengisa izinto ezisebenza kuthotho lweehypermarket, iivenkile zesaphulelo, kunye neevenkile zokutya ezisuka eUnited States, ezikomkhulu eBentonville, eArkansas.
section5.dSupport4: Umthengisi wase-elektroniki wamazwe aphesheya waseMelika izinze eRichfield, eMinnesota. Ekuqaleni yayisekwe nguRichard M. Schulze noJames Wheeler kwi1966 njengevenkile ekhethekileyo yeaudiyo ebizwa ngokuba yiSandi soMculo.
section5.dSupport5: Iinkonzo zentengiso ekwi-Intanethi esekwe e-China ephethwe liQela leAlibaba. Yaziswa ngo-2010, yenziwa ngamashishini amancinci e-China nakwezinye iindawo, ezinje nge-Singapore, ezibonelela ngeemveliso kubathengi be-Intanethi bamanye amazwe.
section5.dSupport6: Umbutho we-e-commerce waseMelika osekwe eSan Jose, eCalifornia, oququzelela ukuthengiswa kwabathengi ukuya kubathengi kunye nokuthengisa kunye nokuthengisa kubathengi kwiwebhusayithi yabo.

section6.sDesc6: Ukuba unayo nayiphi na imibuzo malunga nemveliso, okanye nayiphi na ingcaciso oyifunayo, nceda ungathandabuzi ukunxibelelana nathi.
section6.subject: Isihloko
